items.title: Apeejay Surrendra Park Hotels: Does the correction offer an opportunity to check into this hotel stock?
items.description: The hotelier is poised for pricing growth as it commands industry-leading occupancy levels while its balance sheet remains strong

items.title: What do leading monsoon indicators suggest for this season?
items.description: Most forecasts indicate a low likelihood of an El Niño phase in the next three to five months, which should be good for the rural economy

items.title: Ola Electric's subsidiary settles all dues with Rosmerta Group
items.description: The group will withdraw its petition for alleged default against Ola Electric Technologies from NCLT Bengaluru, the stock filing said

items.title: ONGC, India’s top oil and gas explorer, prepares for a looming glut
items.description: According to the International Energy Agency, the world is entering an era of cheaper energy prices, with growing electricity use leading to a surplus of oil and gas.

items.title: SBI raises $1 billion in one of the largest bank loan of 2025
items.description: Foreign-currency loans taken out by Indian issuers have declined 30% to $3.2 billion so far in 2025 from the year-earlier period, and are running at a four-year low.

items.title: Power Watch: Ahead of another sweltering summer, Centre preparing thermal plants for a record peak demand
items.description: Coal stocks at domestic thermal power plants (TPPs) – a key indicator proportionate to India’s potential to generate electricity - is currently at a historic high of 54 million tonne (MT), according to Power Ministry.

items.title: India slaps Samsung with tax demand of $601 million for telecom imports
items.description: The demand represents a substantial chunk of last year's net profit of $955 million for Samsung in India

items.title: Centre not keen on conversion of Vodafone Idea's debt into further equity: Report
items.description: Government wants the company to raise funds on its own and will resort to debt conversion only if is left with no other choice

items.title: External auditor PwC may submit report on IndusInd Bank's accounting discrepancies on March 28
items.description: The comprehensive report by PwC is expected to point out actual loss to the bank due to accounting discrepancies, lapses at various levels and remedial action, sources said

items.title: Vodafone Idea opts for split IT deal with IBM, Kyndryl at a discounted rate to cut costs
items.description: The new agreement comes at a significantly lower value than the previous $800 million deal with IBM, which ended in April 2024. The move is an effort by the cash-strapped firm to cuts costs

items.title: Delhi HC denies stay against Natco Pharma, potentially paving way for affordable generic drug
items.description: The high court decision potentially opens the door for access to a generic version of the patented drug - Risdiplam - at a fraction of the cost marketed by the Swiss pharmaceutical major.
